mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and red on white) announcing Sheb Wooley with Pat Roberts and the Evergreen Drifters at the 7th Street Theatre in Hoquiam, Washington on March 21. Poster features metal photoplates of Sheb Wooley and Pat Roberts. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/40016.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
